title: Koiseyo Shounen
sinopse:
A collection of one-shots.

Most of these stories are teen boys with teen boys. The exception is story #2 this is an older teen (at least) with what looks to me like a pre-adolescent boy.

1. The Letter From Canada
2. Love Is Pure, Desire Is Maternal Affection!?
3. Like Or Love
4. Be Honest…
